parameters.name: Spectrum Time
parameters.description:
This column contains spacecraft event time (SCET) of the center of        
                                 the 5 second averaging window for the first record in a spectrum.         
                                 Averages are non-overlapping. The time format is given in seconds         
                                 after 00:00:00 UT on Jan 1, 1970. Leap seconds are not accounted          
                                 for in this time format. Each day is assumed to have 86400.0              
                                 seconds and years have either 365 or 366 days.  This time column          
                                 is native to the data; column 1 was calculated from it.

parameters.name: Energy Bin
parameters.description: Center energy value of the data channel.

parameters.name: Spectrum Number
parameters.description:
Ordinal number of spectrum, starting with 1 at the beginning of the file.  
                                 A spectrum is a group of 15 consecutive records, with each record representing 
                                 a sweep at a different energy.

parameters.name: Bx
parameters.description: Magnetic field component along the S/C X-axis.

parameters.name: By
parameters.description: Magnetic field component along the S/C Y-axis.

parameters.name: Bz
parameters.description: Magnetic field component along the S/C Z-axis.
